content.detailedDescription:
I couldn't sleep and stepped outside for a cigarette on my balcony (facing east).  in the east/southeast sky i could see a disc shaped object with a dark center moving southwest.  it traveled above the clouds and my view of it was often obscured by clouds moving in the opposite direction.  the object almost seemed translucent and reminded me of a jellyfish somewhat, but the outer rim seemed reddish or pinkish and the center was dark.  other smaller lights (much smaller) were scattered around the disc.  some darted and away from the disc but they all seemed to be moving in the same general direction (somewhere above midway), sometimes up and down, sometimes in a random path.  there were so many smaller lights that i thought i must be seeing things and rubbed my eyes.  they reminded me of insects under a streetlight but on a much grander scale.  these objects moved out of my sight and behind the apartment building, and i think i must have watched this for about 10 minutes.

the main disc moved a bit quicker than any of the jets on their way to o'hare, and the object seemed to be much higher in the sky.

earlier that evening i saw a spectacular meteor (or bolide) moving from the southwest towards the northeast, and i can't stop thinking about how much activity was in the sky that night.  i am not frightened by what i saw or uneasy, but i am curious as heck.  i know i wasn't seeing things, but this object was totally unlike anything i've seen before.
content.summary: Disc-shaped semi-transluscent object with a dark center.

content.detailedDescription:
Five of us were going home to a friend's apartment from a night out. we were driving down woods chapel rd going west towards 470 hwy. the driver noticed the ufo first and pointed it out to us. it was staying neutral in the same spot directly in front of us. we only saw it for maybe a minute or two and then it got smaller and smaller really fast like it was moving away from us directly west. it looked like it was the same shape as this one, *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg). there was a bright circular white light on the right side of it. then along the bottom of it there was a line of white light. the light was very bright, then dimmed slowly to nothing, then back bright again before it disappeared. all of us couldn't believe what we were seeing. everyone was asking, "are you seeing what i'm seeing?!" i kept saying, "oh my god, oh my god" i'm so mad we didn't pull over and take pictures. although i'm not sure how well the pictures would've turned out because we didn't have actual cameras, just our phones. of course lots of people don't believe us and are assuming that it was a blimp or a helicopter. all of us saw the exact same thing. there's no doubt in our minds that it was an et ufo. none of us have ever seen an aircraft like that before. 
the friend's apartment that we were heading to, that's located right where we saw the ufo, said that they've seen some apache helicopters flying around the little airport that's right by them in the last week. we were thinking that maybe the authorities know something that's going on and they're monitoring or something...
content.summary: Huge dark grey domed saucer with white lights

content.detailedDescription: I m a fi(13166) reporting this for a witness who doesnt have a pc. he has seen objects from 2006-2010 and they have been located in the city of stockton ca. above or near a radio tower in the the midtown area. witness advise that he has several video and photo evident he would like to have someone look at. he has also had some sittings in richmond and berkeley ca. this is a triangle object less than 500 ft away from witness. he discribed the object as having metal appearence, lights red, blue, green and that the surface appeared to be reddish in color. he also advised that he saw a being at one point and has most/all these things on tape
content.summary: Ufos from 2006-2010

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
My son and i were working on his car when i noticed a small obscure object emerging from clouds to my nw. as my son watched the object, i went inside and retrieved binoculars. upon returning, my son and i were amazed at what we were watching. it was a metallic, copper colored(with darker burned spots) perfect disc shaped object. it slowly moved toward us, occasilnally moving back into clouds. i went back inside and retrieved an old vhs camcorder , returned with my wife and began taping.As my son and wife watched thru binoculars, i taped the object as it performed complex manuevers, moving toward the south, ever closer to my location.
i recorded the object for some 12-15 minutes.
to describe the object is simple, it was a perfect disc shaed object with absolutely no features, no structures, highly reflective(as it reflected sunlight), silent and demonstrating controlled flight.
after the object got at it's closest(approx 8000 feet distant), it moved away to the west behind trees.
i immediately called the faa control tower at the tri cities airport to inquire if they had seen anything on their radar since this sighting was in the direct flight path to the airport and was told no that unless the object had a transponder, their radar was not set up to see it.
i also called the national weather service office in morristown and recieved wind data for that day at height. all wind at every level the object occupied was from the west, the direction the object left, proving powered flight. i also requested approx. distance to the clouds from my location using coordinates. the  culumulus cloud bank from which the object emerged when we first saw it was approx 5 miles distant from me at  16:30 hours.
video was shared with dr bruce macabee for analysis. he also asked for and recieved a video shot with the same camera of a yard stick at 50 measured feet also zoomed and normal.  macabee's analysis was thorough and very professional. he surmised the object was some 35 feet in diameter and had an aspect ratio  of 6 to 1. distance varied greatly from the camera to the object. macabee also stated the object was displaying flight characteristics which defied laws of physics.  i originally submitted all this info(including statements from the nws regarding wind data) to mufon by paper forms back in 2003.
content.summary: Family watched and filmed  disc shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
An anonymous witness called me today at 11:40 am: 10:30 pm saturday:
she was driving home from work when she saw a lighted craft just above the clouds over her head on saturday night at approximately 10:32 pm over independence, mo, south of 39th street and lee's summit rd headed in a nw-se direction. she pulled over into a parking lot to watch it. it was not defined and difficult to see - only the large bright circluar white light was clearly visible. a faint outline of a round-shaped object could be seen through the clouds. she watched it for approximately three minutes. it moved very slowly. she got no photos. only one witness was on the scene. the witness stated that it would take a dinner plate to cover the object, or perhaps something larger held at arm's length.  it was at 90 degrees overhead when she first saw it.  

note: nine witnesses saw strange objects within a 6.5 hour period saturday night to sunday morning.  they may be related. see my other reports.
content.summary: Large circlular craft and white light over independence, mo

content.detailedDescription:
Time: approx. 12:15am
location: hwy. 71 south heading north
viewed large shiny sphere above large cargo plane heading toward fort smith airport.
plane was flying lower and lower appearing to begin landing approach or fly by.
silver orb was directly above the plane for several minutes and then vanished.
thought maybe weather balloon but it did not travel like one.
content.summary: Silver orb or sphere tracking cargo plane

content.detailedDescription:
Today 12:34pm i captured three continued pictures of beige color boomerang ufo. this is the fourth time it came for visiting. the first picture shows it in perfect boomerang���s shape. the second picture shows it became a bit like the triangle shape, it formed by 10 dome shape ufo objects. 
this case is one of my long term visitation, more details from: *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).
content.summary: Boomerang formed by dome shaped ufos

content.detailedDescription: The "exploding transformers" in fort worth reveled ufo's above the lights.
content.summary: Light energy display

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were joy riding on the motorcycle, north up highway 24.  near the town of granite, we pulled off to the shoulder to streatch out the kinks.  we were parked on a high bank looking down on the arkansas river.

as we got off the bike i looked up and thought i saw 3 jets flying in a triangular pattern.  i remarked about how cool it was to see them and pointed them out to my husband.  he looked up and upon further watching realized they were not jets.  there were very definite lines connecting the three corners and the entire object was moving very slowly, with no sound.  we both said out loud, "is that......A ufo?"  then we said yes it has to be.  it was far far too large to be anything of ours, "human related".

it looked as though it were traveling at about commercial airliner cruising altitude, so i'm guessing about 35,000 feet.  yet it was so massive, if on earth, there would be no where to park something that large, and no one see it.  the best depiction of size i can give you would be to take a normal sized sheet of printer paper and cut part off to make a perfect square.  then cut off two corners to make a perfect triangle.  now, mesure 1/4 of an inch in on each of the 3 points and draw a straight line (forming a 1/4 inch triagle on the 3 corner of the main paper triangle).  these would depict quite well what we first thought loooked like jets flying in formation.  taking the size of a jet in everyday life into consideration, and filling in all the rest of that triangle with the same sized jets, you can get an exact idea of how massive this thing was.  the points may have been either lights or metalic.

it really blended in with the sky very well.  it moved very slowly compared to a jet.  as it passed over us and the river down below it was moving in a south easterly direction.  it eventually faded because there was a thin lacy cloud layer between us and it, but we watched it untill we could not see it anymore.

it has been bugging me that i cannot find any reports of other sightings of a triangle this huge.  and yes, i don't want people thinking i'm a loon so i have not reported it.  we both saw it.  we both saw the same thing exactly.  another strange thing about the whole incident is that we both agree how strange we felt durring this sighting.  i'm not sure how to describe it, except that it was a floaty, dream-like feeling, a sensation that time itself had been effected....It ticked away slower than normal or something.  now i wonder if it could have been some kind of magnetic field affect or some such thing that made us feel that way.  after that, we went a little further up the road and fished.  that was it.

but has anything of this size been reported anywhere?  that is the frustrating part, besides the fact that we never have the camera with us when we need it.  and now, of course, we keep catching ourselves looking and watching for anything in the skies.  i have seen a couple other strange things over the last 2 years, but not huge like that triangle.  let me know if you want to hear about those.  thank you.
content.summary: Seemed cloaked, mirrored the sky and clouds except for the points.  not just big, but massive.

content.detailedDescription: Travelling s.B. on i-435 when five orange objects in eastern sky caught my eye. i stopped to observe this phenomena, as they flew slowly, albeit radical, at about 20 degrees above horizon. as they spread and slowly began to disappear into the clouds above (low celing), a larger and brighter orange object at a faster speed, about 1-2 degrees above the horizon, behind the treeline, and then as it started to ascend, split into five smaller orange objects, again radical in flight, without formation, and slowly ascended into the clould cover. this occurred about 20 times over a 25 minute span. they all came from the north (low on horizon) to south and then turning toward the east and then into cloud cover. at one time, i observed over 15 in the sky at one time. at approx 9:58 pm, the largest ball at a faster speed flew, split into 5 smaller objects, they followed the same path as the previous objects, and then the event seemed to stop. there were other vehicles on the shoulder of the highway observing this event. i got one persons name and phone, and the next day he related that he talked to another individual who also saw this phenomenon. once they all rose above the treeline, i would approximate their speed at approx. that of a helicopter. but the jerky motion didn't make sense, and the coloration from a side view made no sense, as the sun had been down for over an hour and the low altitude above the eastern horizon would pretty much rule out solar reflection. i would guess that over the period that i observed these objects, there were approximately 125 of them. i do not do drugs/drink/or subject to illusions. i am observant, logical, and well educated. this happened, it was unexplainable, and a bit spooky. as this event lasted so long, with so many objects, i would presume that radar somewhere would have picked this up. if possible, i would like an explanation from some tower or authority trying to explain this to me. the initial speed of these objects at low altitude seemd to be about 100-120 kph, but during ascent appeared to slow to around 60-80kph. the wind was about 15 knots, which might contribute to some of the uneveness of flight, but probably not.
content.summary: Multiple waves of 5 orange/low to high trajectory

content.detailedDescription:
I arrived home at 1:15am.  i live in the country and activily search the night skies with both gen iii night vision and ir cameras.  my daughter and i have made one report on mufon for a sighting a couple of years ago.  we have activly seen unexplained craft in our night skies ranging from 1 very large diamond shaped craft to other unexplained high altitude craft.  my background is former military and active law enforcement.

on this evening as i said i just returned home and since the skies were clear i got out the night scope and and spent some time looking up.   withing just about 2 minutes of searching a glowing translucent white orb or sphere about the size of a beach ball floated between my out building and house.  the sphere was only about 40 feet in the air.  it was not a bird or owl or bat.  its velocity was slow and deliberate. 

you could alomost see through the sphere and it glowed more on the outer edges of its outline.  i quickly pulled the scope down and looked right above me to try to see it.  it could not be seen with the naked eye at night.  i reacquired it in the scope and continued to observe it floating direcly over my nieghbors home briefly paausing and then continuing on to the next nieghbors roof top again pausing.  i lost sight of it within about 3 or 4 minutes.  i made several attempts to reposition myself to locate it but could not.   

as i stated this was not a bird or other flying animal.  the thing i remember just before i saw the object was, i have a pen of game birds which roost at night.  just before i saw the object my birds became very active in the pen.  it made me wonder if a critter or coyote might be near them, at that moment the sphere became visible to me over head as i was pointing the scope back near the pen to see what got them going.

i stated i actively search the night skies since we had our first spotting a couple of years ago and have seen lots of things in the sky that defy logic and are unexplainable.  this event, to me was alarming as it seemed to be intelligently and briefly making stops over our homes in a grid pattern.  since that night i have experiences tremendous nightmares.  i guess this one gave me the spooks.
content.summary: Translucent sphere orb visible in night vision only

content.detailedDescription:
Me my wife and four other friends mine were driving home from a long night out drinking. it was about 4:05 am on 5-15-11 driving down woods chapel road in lee summit, mo. i was looking down the road and i saw in the distance, yet clear as day, a ufo. i yelled at everyone in the car to look up in the sky. oh my god was pretty much the reaction of everyone in the car. the object was large and defiantly an aircraft we had all never seen. as i drove closer in the direction of the craft it seemed to stay at the same height yet either got farther and farther away or just got smaller and smaller. three of us drew out what we saw and all came out with the same drawing of the ship. the strangest part of all this is that i live by an airport that single engine planes usually fly out of. for the last 7 days i have seen multiple apache helicopters landing and flying around the airport. i have lived at my apartment for close to a year and have never seen anything other than single engine planes land there. we are all certain of what we saw and with the helicopters flying around all week i am convinced that their is an alien ship or something of that nature here close to were i live.
*(wit's email address removed -- cms/sg).
content.summary: Gray saucer with a long light and two smaller lights

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were returning from keys views in joshua national park around 7:30 pm after a sunset photo shoot. on our way home to our hotel, but still in the park, my wife spotted a very bright glowing object sitting low in the clear blue sky. the glow may have been intensified by the setting sun. above the object was a large dark cloud.

my wife asked me if i thought  it was a star. i said no because  it was too low in the sky.  i am a big ufo buff and immediately said it was a ufo. my wife is a very big skeptic and said it was not.   

then, to our surprise  the object began to move upward very slowly. we could easily follow its trajectory as it crossed slivers of cloud stretching  out. 

we discussed in detail  if it could be a plane , helicopter or meteor, but we both agreed that it was clearly not any of those. there were no flashing lights, no noise. a meteor  would not be expected to move straight up. it  was not a rocket. it moved too slowly for that. there were no contrails. 

we followed the object's path for about 5-10 minutes until it disappeared into the black cloud. 

at that point we both deemed it a ufo  but not claiming that it was extraterrestrial.   

for the first time my wife was very intrigued and mystified by the event. 

in conclusion: we have no doubt we saw a  ufo. it was not a conventional aircraft or a star or a meteor etc.
content.summary: elongated brightly lit object hovered in the sky and then slowlly moved up

content.detailedDescription: I was inspecting the roof of a house i was interested in purchasing & later that evening, while looking at my photographs of the damaged roof on the house, i noticed two dark round objects in my photo. they did not make a sound & i was not aware of them when taking the photo. they do not look like birds, they are too round. this was just a couple miles from the twentynine palms us. marine corps base. i was wondering if anyone else saw something that day.
content.summary: Two dark round objects near the us. marine base

content.detailedDescription:
Im going to try and be brief. driving on the i-10 west headed to la from palm spring, indian wells - it started with a flash from an orb like a object coming from high altitude and shooting all the way down [ perfectly vertical ] in a fraction of a second and then disappeared. knowing the likeness of other objects being around, i carefully chose to drive slowly and take a look. what seemed to appear as red dots floating in the sky seemed to appear a few miles away from where this object was first witnessed. i could tell that it was not a star or anything of any other sort because the visibility tonight was incredible. a breathtaking sky could only give away the fact that indeed these circle like objects were floating in mid air, i could differentiate the fact that these lights were pulsating as if they were monitoring the surrounding skies..... the air had a certain feel to it [that i cant explain ] and so did the rest of the environment until way later that i finally drove out of the desert into downtown la.  it doesn't seem to be just a few...... these objects, whatever they are, wherever they come from and for whatever reason they are here are starting to manifest themselves more and more everyday...... look up russian news.... they had a huge sighting just last night, turns out russian military shot up flares into the sky of a village to warn them of the object [ also red ] and apparently fying in zig-zag patterns across the sky. 

wake up.
love.
content.summary: Beam / ships&or orbs

content.detailedDescription:
This is a summation of thre seperate observations
 links to my youtube records of the events...Including illustrations and video, and photos
*(links moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).

additional information- i'd estimate altitude at 3000 ft based on location above cumulus clouds.

i was walking my dog 
the object/ contrails were huge and impossible to ignore. 
i cant explain what could cause these sharp angles in contrails.
i felt excitement and interest and curiosity and amazement and a sense of adventure and fun.
i lost sight becuase the sun set and it became dark.
content.summary: Impossible contrails- twice witnessed- one year apart- also photos taken of spheres with blue angels in same location

content.detailedDescription: Was about to check ipod touch for push messages for emails (located on table by window), when i spotted orange coloured lights(shperes) in the sky, at first thought maybe planes, but there were no flashing lights that are typical on aircraft, so i posted what i was seeing on my facebook page. someone suggested lanterns, but there was no "flickering" as you would expect to find in lanterns and given they seemed to be flying in formation, i didn't understand how lanterns could move so slowly without the "flicker" of a candle,:let alone that they were all travelling in a straight line horizontally. went to bedroom window and noticed there were about 6 at first, then more followed; all moving at the same speed (slowly) and many followed for about 15 mins. more just kept coming (about 50 in total- i had posted "hundreds" on my facebook page- as i was stunned at there being so many). i opened the window, to find out if there was any noise, but there was silence. they all seemed to be following one. it's like they were "floating in silence but with a direction and all at the same speed". bright orange coloured spheres that also seemed to (at exactly the same time)seemed to change to green underneath (all at the same time); it just seemed weird that they were all moving at exactly the same speed, and completely in silence (since i had opened the window to find out if i could hear anything-but there was silence). relatively close (close enough to be able to tell that they were large and spherical). my camera hadn't been charged (as i rarely use it and i don't have a mobile/cell phone) but it is documented on my facebook page during the sighting. i got a torch (flash-light) and began flashing it in their direction through the window(sounds silly i know). i wasn't scared; if anything i was hoping they would spot my flash-light (i would have no problem if they were actual ufo's, i would gladly go). afterwards, i kept posting comments on my facebook account, as i was very excited (in a good/healthy way). i have always been fascinated by the ufo phenomenon, but this is the first time i have witnessed anything first hand. i may state-i wasn't drinking (i haven't had a drink in over 3 yrs) or under the influence of any drugs. after about 15 mins i went to get my camera (as when i first spotted them i plugged in my camera in to charge it)and returned to my bedroom window, but they had simply disappeared. i went to the window at the top of the stairs at a different part of my flat (window view would have been able too see them if they continued in the same flight pattern-only a 45 degree angle difference)but they had simply just "vanished". i know there will be doubters, or people who mock me, but i don't care-i know what i saw, and i stand behind it 100%. camera is now fully charged, and i will be paying attention (with more interest from now on) to the skies above.
content.summary: Orange shperes

content.detailedDescription: I had been driving my car and my daughter saw a very weird cloud that looked like a tornado so we took out my phone and took a pic. we sent it to our email. later that night we downloaded it to our computer and we saw all these black circles in the cloud about 10 of them. we we making the pic turn negative and you can very much see that they are a solid mass.  we were not even looking for these shapes. we could not see them with our eyes at the time at all. this is very exciting
content.summary: My daughter saw a very weird cloud that looked like a tornado so we took out my phone and took a pic. we sent it to our email. later that night we downloaded it to our computer and we saw all these black circles in the cloud about 10 of them.

content.detailedDescription: Saw two boomarang ufos in the west looked like they were over us75 .   my wife and i were just leaving the sonic about 7:30pm today 5/11/2011.  a line of thunderstorm had just passed through the area and it was still raining lightly.    we pulled into the grocery store parking lot across from the sonic drivein.  with the truck facing west we continued to look at two boomarang clouds white, sharp tips instead of round.   they were intese white, while the clouds above them were dark vinilla.   the sky looked like it was starting to clear in the west, but just barely.   i could see two layers of clouds one passing over the other in different directions.  the lower clouds hung down like drap bunchings sagging down like gumdrops across the sky.  the  two white  boomarang shaped clouds, were sitting at a angle the right side of the boomarang higher than the left.   still and not moving.   we wached them for several mins.  they  did not move.    then either the  clouds that were above the boomarangs  came down and enveloped them or they receided into the clouds.   it looked like they just receded into the clouds and were obscured from our view.    the closest one to us may have been 100 feet or more  from wing tip to wing tip.  twenty feet thick in the middle.  just guessing.    after the boomarangs receided into the clouds,   a business jet came around us from the south, passing in front of us in the west and curving back to the south looking like it was on approach to the mckinney airport nearby.   it was low to the ground under the cloud cover.   it didn't look much higher than the radio tower to the north of us. we felt excited and that maybe they were looking back at us.
content.summary: Boomerangs white clouds not moving

content.detailedDescription: The first time i saw a ufo was in japan, at night. there was a bright light that kept zooming in and out and moving crazy (up, down, side to side etc..). the second time i was on vacation in egypt and i was sitting beside the pool (also at night) with my parents, and i was looking up in the sky and i found three big white dots in the sky flying in straight line, the dots were like this. o o o. then suddenly the two dots at the ends started roaming around the one in the middle then they suddenly went up down like i explained above. then it disappeared . i tried convincing my parents and friend but the thought i was crazy.
content.summary: Three large dots rotating around the middle one then disappears in

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from a friends house in the middle of a sunny bright day and while climbing up a hill in my car i saw something move in the corner of my eye in the sky. i was looking towards lax airport but a few thousand feet or so above it. at first it looked like a meteor falling because of the distance it was and the whitish light emitting off of it, but then all of a sudden it came to a sudden instant stop. when it stopped it looked like a star that is visible in the day, it didn't look like an aircraft at all. then i pulled over and asked myself if i had just seen what i saw? i continued to look up to see if i could still see it and then what i thought was a visible day star just above the object i just saw, instantly moved very quickly to the right and stopped, i then saw a third star like object move to another position. the position of all three of them ended in a triangle shape. i also noticed as they changed position it let off a metallic glare when the sun hit them and that's when i thought to myself i can't believe i'm seeing this right now. i had wished someone were with me to assure myself i wasn't going crazy. the incident only lasted a matter of thirty seconds or so and as quickly as they made the triangular shape they speed off out of sight in a matter of a quarter of a second in the same direction. the flew off so fast i knew it wasn't man made and all i could think about is that it almost looked like they playing with each other in the air, like dancing together the way they moved in such perfect cue and simultaneously.
content.summary: 3 metalic "meteor like" shapes

content.detailedDescription:
somewhat distraught over a relationship breakup, i decided to take a late night walk to try to clear my thoughts. i found myself walking just outside newville (half a mile?) when i glanced up to see a yellow light moving across the sky somewhat above the mountain. my first thought was that it was a satellite or plane/jet with the sun still reflecting off of it. watching it, i further thought, "wait a minute...It's almost 2 am...The sun wouldn't still be refecting at this time." also noting that it was moving a little faster than normal nighttime objects, i stopped walking to watch it. as soon as i stopped walking, the object slowed down, dropped lower and shot my direction so fast that i ducked down behind the embankment beside the road. it was at this time that i noticed the crickets were all chirping very loudly. after a few seconds, i got the courage to slowly stand back upright and look. at this point, i saw a disc with a small dome on top hovering above the trees possibly near the conodoguinet creek some distance away. at this point, the disc appeared to land in a group of trees. i did not stick around to see any more, running as fast as i could towards newville. near the elementary school, a car stopped and asked if i needed a ride. i took the ride into the center of town. on the short ride, the driver, apparently seeing my fear, asked if i was ok. i thought for a second to ask if he saw it too, but decided he would think i'm nuts, so i just said yeah, i was ok. dropped off at my car just outside a friends house, i knocked on their door, but his dad came to the door and told me to go after i said what i had seen. he thought i was on drugs (i wasn't, nor had i been drinking). later his dad said i was "white as a sheet."
       the object itself was similar to the one at the top of this webpage, but with a smaller dome and the top part coming down lower, making the bottom almost flat. the entire object was glowing a dull yellow, but with at least four lights on the bottom glowing brighter and lighting further, sequentially (rapidly)in a clockwise rotation. the dome was also glowing quite a bit brighter than the body, with the exception of a darker spot on the dome, that made me think it was something in the dome watching outside, causing me great fear. i can easily draw a picture of it still 37 years later.
content.summary: Ufo disc  "landing" near newville, pa

content.detailedDescription: I was in my car on passenger side..Husband was driving..He did not see any thing...I  saw a cloud just above the tree line over homes..It was going at a fast rate of speed...With a trail .. it was not a balloon, or aircraft.. what was it??? it has haunted me ever since january 2011.  has anyone seen something like that.
content.summary: A small cloud over my tree line going at a great speed with  a trail

content.detailedDescription: At about 11:15pm, i was traveling n on i-5 to the sacramento airport. as i was passing the hwy 99 split, i saw lights in the sky in the distance ahead of me.  they were not moving. most lights in the sky near the airport move.  these did not. because air traffic flies over i-5, i'm usually pay attention to what's above me whenever i travel on this section of this freeway. as i exited i-5 and traveled the road to take me to terminal a, i could still see the lights. i was able to make out three lights close together in a row.  they still weren't moving.  i actually pulled over and stopped my vehicle to make sure the lights weren't moving (and that it was not a helicopter).  the three lights were located high above the main parking lot.  high enough that they did not appear to be a part of any aviation equipment, based on my observation.  as i drove through terminal a, the person i was there to pick up hadn't made it down to baggage yet.  i had to circle around the airport again.  when i returned to the road that leads to terminal a, the lights were gone.
content.summary: Three lights close together, giving the appearance of a rectangle

content.detailedDescription: Myself and two friends have been attending canterbury school. after study hall we have went up to the soccer field as we did every night to smoke cigarettes. the field over looked a highway and some mountains in the distance. we have first noticed what looked like a bright start compared to other stars. what put this object out of place is the movement in which it moved in. the movement was linear another words it was moving in straight lines. after about ten minutes of watching this thing which must have been rather far away as it only appeared as a bright star, the object appeared to be getting closer. after another five minutes the object appeared to be in front of us and slowly moved over head. the object was tremendous in size. it was triangular in shape with a bright light in the middle and smaller bright lights on each corner. the most amazing thing about it was that it made absolutely no sound. we could actually hear crickets and frogs and no other noise coming from the object. being in shock and scared my friend and i ran under a tractor which was there and another friend just stood there looking in the sky. as the object moved slowly forward we followed it in the direction it moved. there was another person we meet on the way which was as mesmorized as we were, the hockey rink attendant. he was an older gentleman and stood looking up at the sky as we were. then as fast as it appeared the object moved across the sky and disapeared. we got back to the dorm and i immedietly called the police dept to report this thing. the operator informed me that no one else reported any other sightings. the following few days some other students were making fun of us so we decided to drop our story. i am not some crazy person and was definitaly skeptical when it came to hearing stories of ufo's. i hope my story helps you. the incident took place in either 1998 or 1999 in new milford, ct.
content.summary: Ufo in new milford ct

content.detailedDescription: I was taken a vacation to daytona beach whit my girfriend soon we arrived to place or stoff inside the hotel we notice a big light ball in sky and then turning small and disapear i immidiately took a picture of the activity notice later that this light was making a circle before vanish in the sky.This objet at close look is like a ball with a shadow on the bottom making a verry wire manuvior on the sky. i will send you by e-mail copy of this fenomenon encounter in florida penhandle.
content.summary: Big light in the sky going arrownd and then when low up to the sky

content.detailedDescription: Was looking out my mothers tenth floor balcoiny window when i noticed over a period of about 5 mins. low in the nothern sky 8 bright white orbs just appear out of nowhere and begin to move horizontally in the sky at a slow speed and then rise rapidly straight up above the cloud cover. they lit up the clouds as they moved through them.
content.summary: 8 orbs appearing and acending

content.detailedDescription: I was lying on pool deck just looking up the sky enjoying the nice weather i noticed a plane flying n-ne,then just looking straight up a fast moving round object came into view. it was moving in a w-nw direction. it seemed to be at a higher alttitude than the jet and moved in a straight path, it took about 4 seconds to be out of sight. so if you lay on your back and track your finger in a straight line and count to 4, thats how fast this was moving. there wasn't any noise or contrails or wings as i know them.
content.summary: Fast silent round flying object

content.detailedDescription: I send in alot of strange pictues i capture on this web cam site... alot of you non-believers are saying that these lights and these space ship looking crafts are planes lineing up to land at newark airport, jfk airport etc....Etc....Etc...???  listen to me there are not stacking these so called planes this close together in order to clear them for landing...And when i see them its late at nite 11pm, midnight, 1 or 2 or 3 am...I live by newark airport and there aren't so many flights coming in that late at night or in that type of pattern.. did all u idiots forget about 911 and the restricted air space around nyc??? look at the craft in these pictures...There not airplanes or helicopters you f&^%$ing idiots....There ufo's with far more advanced craft then u dump shits could ever dream about...!!!!
content.summary: Wired ny web cam ufo's !!!!

content.detailedDescription: I was out on the back deck smoking a cigarette, it was a bright sunny day, about 4pm, with clouds and i happen to look up toward the west in the sky and that was when i had seen a long, cigar-shape, type of unidentified object. it was a very long-distance away, but i could still be able to tell what type of shape and color. the color was a bright, silver that was shiny as if it was illuminated in the sky. there were clouds in the area it was at, and as it was streaking across, it went into the one area of clouds, and never returned to the other side. i am certain it was not any type of plane, or helicopter since of the shape and color and they way it streaked, and the fact it completely disappeared and did not return to my view after flying into the clouds. they way it flew was a fast, streak across the sky type of pattern. i knew instantly, that it was not something that the military uses, since we do have a air base here, and you always see aircraft flyng, but this was not anything i have ever seen before especially with the color, shape, and flyng pattern. at first, i was at a still, and did not want to move or turn away, since i was afraid that it was going to disappear, but it took only a minute to lose sight of it. i know what i have seen, and not one person could convince me that these type of happenings are not real. there is something that is going on, and it has been for thousands to millions of years, till the present time of today.
content.summary: Long cigar shape, very bright, silver and shiny
